affect ( "player", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ INSERT )
{
	use ( "tower02_barrel" );
	use ( "tower02_ex01" );
	use ( "tower02_bb01" );
	use ( "tower02_bb02" );
	use ( "tower02_bb03" );
	use ( "tower02_bb04" );
	use ( "tower02_bb05" );
	use ( "tower02_bb06" );

	affect ( "snipertower", /*@AFFECT_TYPE*/ FLUSH )
	{
		set ( /*@SET_TYPES*/ "SET_HEALTH", -1 );
	}

	wait ( 50.000 );
	remove ( "tower02hurt" );
}
